name: Miinoto Exchangeable Group File
summary: File created by miinoto, an iOS application used for creating notes and to-do lists; stores a group of notes, each of which that can include rich content such as text, images, maps, audio, and embedded files such as PDFs; enables users to transmit a group of miinoto notes to other miinoto users for viewing on their mobile devices.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
